title: Wagamama-style Japanese katsu curry
ingredients: ['1 onion, roughly chopped', '60ml water', '1/4 to 1 teaspoon oil', '5 mustard seeds', '1 pinch ground asafoetida (hing)', '1/8 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch chilli powder (optional)', '1/8 teaspoon paprika', '65g to 130g tomato pur√©e (double concentrate)', '1/4 teaspoon minced root ginger', '1/4 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 pinch ground mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon ground coriander seeds', '1/4 teaspoon ground fenugreek seeds', '1/8 teaspoon ground fennel seeds', '1/8 teaspoon ground cumin', 'ground black pepper, to taste', '1 stick liquorice root', '1 star anise', '300ml water', '50g to100g creamed coconut', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '4 tablespoons dark muscovado sugar']
